turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello, can you order a pizza from Papa John for me?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, which location do you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want Papa John on New York Street at Aurora.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem, what kind of pizza do you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want an X-large supreme pizza please. But instead of green pepper can I get zucchini on that?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I'm not sure. Let me check with them.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Take your time.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Unfortunately, they don't have zucchini. Do you want something else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Too bad. Can I have spinach please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Let me check. They do have spinach.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Perfect, please go ahead and order the pizza for me.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem. They confirmed your order of an X-large supreme pizza, replacing green pepper with spinach.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Excellent. Please pay them from my account with Papa John.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem. Your pizza order is complete and the pizza will be ready for pickup in about 25 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Perfect.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your receipt will be sent to your mobile phone via text message.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Got it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Is there anything I can help?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, thank you very much. Bye!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You are welcome. Goodbye!
